titleStmt.title: Sǝnkǝssar “Synaxarion” (the second half of the year)

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / beta maṣāḥǝft

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; names of donors and scribes; some lines in the incipit page, alternating with black lines; two initial lines of each section; elements of punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals; the word sälam (e.g., fols. 3rc, 8rb, 10rb).

p.span: ተፈጸመ᎓ መጽሐፈ᎓ ስንክሳር᎓ ለእግዚአብሔር᎓ በሥምረቱ᎓ እንዘ᎓ ይረድአነ᎓ በክሂሎቱ። ስብሐት᎓ ሎቱ። እስመ᎓ ተለዓለ᎓ ስሙ᎓ ለባሕቲቱ። በ፸፻᎓፩፻᎓፵᎓ወ፬᎓ ዓመተ᎓ ምሕረት᎓ እንዘ᎓ ዓበቅቴ᎓ ፲ወ፰። መጥቅዕሂ᎓ ፲ወ፪᎓ ጥንትዮን᎓ ፬ በሳድሳይ᎓ ወርኅ᎓ ለፀሐይ᎓ ጊዜ᎓ ሥርቀቱ። ለሳብዕ᎓ ወረኅ᎓ እምቅድመ᎓ ግብአቱ᎓ እም፯ሠርቀ᎓ ሌሊት᎓ አመ፲ወ፭᎓ ለየካቲት᎓ ሠርቀ᎓ መዓልት᎓ ለንጉሥነ᎓ ፋሲለደስ᎓ በ፲ወ፱᎓ ዓመተ᎓ መንግሥቱ᎓ ጳጳስሂ᎓ አባ᎓ ሚካኤል᎓ ወመምህርሂ᎓ አባ᎓ ዘሥላሴ᎓ ወቀይሰ᎓ ገበዝሂ᎓ ብእሴ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ ወሱታፌሆሙ᎓ ገብርኤል᎓ ለዘጸሐፎ᎓ ዘወልደ᎓ ማርያም᎓ ወለዘአጽሐፎ᎓ ለዘ᎓ አንበቦ᎓ ወለዘተርጐሞ᎓ ወለዘሰምዓ᎓ ቃላቲሁ᎓ ይጽሐፍ᎓ ስሞሙ᎓ ኀበ᎓ ዓምደ᎓ ወርቅ᎓ በቀለመ᎓ ጽድቅ። ክርስቶስ᎓ ሊቅ᎓ አመ᎓ ይመጽእ᎓ በንጥረ᎓ መባርቅት᎓ ወድልቅል[ቅ]᎓ ወተፍጻሜቱኒ᎓ ኮነ᎓ በዕለተ᎓ ሠሉስ᎓ በ፯ሰዓት።

span.span: Synaxarion has been completed with the will of God, while He assists us with His might. May praise be to Him, because only His name is superior. In 7144 A.M. while ˁabӓqte is 18, mӓṭqǝ 12, ṭəntyon 4, on the 6th month during the rise of the sun. Before the commencement of the 7th month, from the 7th śärqä lelit, on the 15th of Yäkkatit śärqä mӓˁalt, on the 19th year of reign of our king Fasilädäs. The metropolitan ˀabba Michael, and the mämhər ˀabba Zä-Śәllase, and the qäysä gäbäz

and their companion Gäbrˀel. To Zä-Wäldä Maryam, one who wrote it, to one who made it written, to one who red it, to one who translated it, to one who listened its words may write their names on a pillar of Gold by an ink of righteousness. When Christ, the chief, comes with flash of lightning and trembling, the end becomes on the day of Tuesday at the seventh hour.

supportDesc.extent:
Made of 165.0 folios, of which 3.0 blank, in 20.0 quires.
39.5 34.5 9.0

list.item: 8 ፳፬II(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 13r-20v)
8 ፳፭III(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2; 8, stub after 1/fols. 21r-29v)
8 ፳፰VI(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6 stub after 3/fols. 50r-57v)
8 ፴፪X(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 6; 7, stub after 1/fols. 84r-91v)
7 ፵፩XIX(7; s.l.: 4, stub before 2; 5, stub between 1 and 2; 6, stub after 1/fols. 159r-165v).

layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

handDesc.handNote: Fine Black, red (vivid scarlet) Zä-Krǝstos and four other scribesFive scribes were involved in the copying of the Ms.: Zä-Krǝstos copied the section for Mägabit (quires I-III); his name is written in the bottom margin of fol. 3r and in Additiones 3, 4. Śärḍä Mikaʾel copied the section for Miyazya (quires IV-V); his name is written in the bottom margin of fol. 30r and in Additiones 1, 6. Yämanä Krǝstos copied the section for Gǝnbot (quires VI-VIII); his name is written in the bottom margin of fol. 50r. Ṣägga Krǝstos copied the section for Ḥamle (quires XII-XV); his name is written in the bottom margin of fol. 101r. Zä-Wäldä Maryam is mentioned in the colophon.Mid-17th century

span.span: መምረይ᎓ ገብረ᎓ ጻድቅ᎓ እቃቤት። ዛቲ᎓ መጽሐፍ᎓ ዘጸሐፍዋ᎓ ሰርጸ᎓ ሚካኤል᎓ አሜንጴ᎓ መምህርነ᎓ ዘዮሐንስ ይባርክ᎓ አሜን᎓ ለይኩን።
Fol. 2r: Mäməräy Gäbrä Ṣadəq is (head of) store. This book is written by Särṣä Michael ˀAmenṗe(?). May our teacher Zä-Yoḥannəs bless, Amen, so be it.
ወበዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ ካዕበ፡ ተዝካረ፡ ዕረፍቱ፡ ለአቡነ፡ ብእሴ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ በረከተ፡ አምላኩ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስሌነ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን።

item.p: The note is written at the upper margin of the reading for Mäggabit 2.

span.span: ወበዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ አዕረፈት፡ እኅተ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ዓመተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ሠናይት፡ ግዕዝ፡ መፍቄሪተ፡ አኃው፡ አምሳለ፡ ፌቤን፡ ተለአኪተ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ጸሎታ፡ ወበረከታ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ፍቁራ፡ ብእሴ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡

item.p: The note is written at the upper margin of the reading for Mägabit 27.

span.span: Fol. 29rb: Supplication note mentioning the commissioners and the scribe.
ለዘአጽሐፍዎ፡ ገብርኤል፡ ወብእሴ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወለዘጸሐፎ፡ ዘክርስቶስ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ይክፍሎሙ፡ ማኅደረ፡ ውስተ፡ መንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ ምስለ፡ ጻድቃን፡ ወሰማዕት፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን። ወበሉ፡ ሎሙ፡ አቡነ፡ ዘበሰማያት፡
As to the commissioners Gäbrˀel and
se ˀƎgziˀabḥer, and to the scribe
Zä-Krəstos, may God reward them a place in the Kingdom of Heaven with the righteous and the martyrs, forever and ever Amen. You may recite for them Pater Noster.

item.p: By the same hand with the main text.

div.span: Fol. 39v: Commemorative notice on ˀabba Zä-ˀAḥadu, head of Däbrä Dammo

span.span: ወበዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ ካዕበ፡ አዕረፈ፡ አባ፡ ዘአሐዱ፡ አምላክ፡ መምህር፡ ዘደብረ፡ ዳሞ፡ ተጋዳሊ፡ ትሩፍ፡ ዘአስረፀ፡ ክንፈ፡ ከመ፡ ዖፍ፡ ለተወርዎ፡ ጸድፍ። ጸሎቱ፡ ወበረከቱ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ፍቁሩ፡ ብእሴ፡ እግዚአብሔር። ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም

div.span: Supplication note mentioning the commissioner and the scribe.

span.span: ለዘጸሐፎ፡ ሠርፀ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወለዘአጽሐፎ፡ አቡነ፡ ዘሥላሴ፡ ኅቡረ፡ ይምሐሮሙ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ በመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ ወይረሲ፡ ማኅደሮሙ፡ ምስለጻድቃን፡ ወሰማዕት፡ አሜን።

p.span: Śärḍä Mikaˀel and the commissioner ˀabunä Zäśәllase, may God forgive them together in the kingdom of heaven and may He make their dwelling with the righteous and martyrs, Amen.

div.span: Fol. 55v: Commemorative notice on ˀabba Yoḥanni

span.span: ወበዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ ካዕበ፡ ተዝካሩ፡ ለአባ፡ ዮሐኒ፡ መነኮስ፡ ትሩፍ፡ መስተጋድል፡ ዘደብረ፡ ዳሞ፤ ውእቱ፡ አቡሆሙ፡ ለአቡነ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፤ ወለአባ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ሞአ፡ ዘሐይቅ። ጸሎቱ፡ ወበረከቱ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስሌነ።

item.p: The note is written at the upper margin of the reading on Gǝnbot 10.

div.span: Fol. 63r: Commemorative notice on ˀabba Ǝsṭifanos.

span.span: ወበዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ ካዕበ፡ አዕረፉ፡ አባ፡ እስጢፋኖስ፡ ወመርዐተ፡ አብ፡ ሱቱፋነ፡ ምግባር፡ ወግእዝ፡ ትሩፋን፡ መስተጋድላን፡ ዘደብረ፡ ዳሞ፡ ጸሎቶሙ፡ ወበረከቶሙ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ፍቁሮሙ፡ ብእሴ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን።

p.span: Fol. 114r: Commemorative notice on ˀabba Täwäldä Mädḫǝn, hermit and monk.
Fol. 120r: Commemorative notice on ˀabunä Tärbinos.

div.span: Fol. 134v: Commemorative notice on Queen Maryam K
әbra, the wife of King Naˁod (r. 1494-1508).

span.span: ወበዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ ካዕበ፡ አዕረፈት፡ ማርያም፡ ክብራ፡ ንግሥት፡ ብእሲተ፡ ንጉሥ፡ ናኦድ፡ ዘዓቀበት፡ ምግባራተ፡ መንፈሳዌ፤ ወፈጸመት፡ ኵሎ፡ ትሩፋተ፡ ወተጋድሎተ፡ ብዙኃ፡ ወፈጸመት፡ ቀኖና፡ መነኮሳት፡ ቅድሳት፡ በደብረ፡ ሊባኖስ፤ ዘይእቲ፡ መቃብረ፡ አቡነ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ረድኤተ፡ ትንብልናሃ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ኵልነ፡ ሕዝበ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን።
፡ በዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ አዕረፈ፡ አባ፡ ዘሥላሴ፡ መምህር፡ ዘደብረ፡ ዳሞ፡ መስተጋድል፡ ትሩፍ፡ ወዕረፍቱኒ፡ ኮነ፡ በገዳመ፡ ዋሊ፡ በእደ፡ ጋላተ፡ ዘውእቱ፡ አረሚ፡ ጸሎቱ፡ ወበረከቱ፡ ወዕሤተ፡ ስምዑ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ፍቁሩ፡ ብእሴ፡ እግዚአብሔ፡ር ወምስለ፡ ኵልነ፡ ሕዝበ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን።

div.span: Fol. 149r: Commemorative notice on ˀabunä Zä-Wäldä Maryam

span.span: ወካዕበ፡ በዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ አቡነ፡ ዘወልደ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘደብረ፡ ዳሞ፡ በገዳመ፡ ዋሊ፡ ድኅረ፡ ተጋደለ፡ ሠናየ፡ ገድለ፡ በከመ፡ ተምህረ፡ እም፡ አረጋዊ፡ አቡሁ፡ እስከ፡ ያነክሩ፡ አኃዊሁ፡ እምትሩፋቲሁ። ወትሩፋቲሁኒ፡ ኮነ፡ ይገብር፡ ቆብዓ፡ ዘሐፂን፡ ክቡደ፤ ዓዲ፡ ኮነ፡ ይትቀሰፍ፡ በነደ፡ እሳት፡ ዘሐፂን፡ እስከ፡ ይፀይእ፡ ወይወጽእ፡ ዕፄ፡ እምሥጋሁ፤ ዓዲ፡ ኮነ፡ ይከሪ፡ ግበ፡ መጠነ፡ ቆሙ፡ ወይበውእ፡ ውስቴቱ፡ እስከ፡ ይትሌለይ፡ ማዕሰ፡ ሥጋሁ፡ እምብዝኃ፡ ዋዕይ። ዓዲ፡ ኮነት፡ እግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ትትናገሮ፡ በቃላ፡ ጥዑም፡ በውሣጤ፡ ሥዕላ፡ እምዝኃ፡ ንጽህናሁ፡ ወአፍቅሮቱ፡ ኪያሃ፡ ናዛዚተ፤ በጊዜ፡ መከራ። ባሕቱ፡ ኢጸሐፍነ፡ ኵሎ፡ ገድሉ፡ ከመ፡ ኢናብዝኅ፡ ነገረ፡ እስመ፡ ዝንቱ፡ የዓክለነ፡ ለሰማዕያን። እግዚአብሔር፡ ይምሐረነ፡ በጸሎቱ፡ ለኵልነ፡ ሰማዕያን፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም።

div.span: ne-poem by Gälawdewos of ˀAksum (ˀAxumite), of mäwäddǝs type.
ወኆኅተ᎓ ሰማይ ርኁት፤ ነገረ᎓ ቃለ᎓ ምክር᎓ መንፈሳዊ፤
ትእምርተ᎓ ነገር᎓ ፍኖተ᎓ ጽድቅ፤ ድሉተ ተሀልዊ፤
እንዘ᎓ ይኤምኀኪ᎓ አፈ፤ አፈ᎓ ቊልዔኪ᎓ ዕብራዊ፤

p.span: ነዋ᎓ ይብለኪ᎓ ቅድመ᎓ እሉ፤ አእላፈ᎓ ያሬድ᎓ ማኅሌታዊ፤

item.p: Fol. 165r: Zä-ˀaqräbku maḫletä… “The song I am offering…” (concluding prayer)
The same prayer is found in the Synaxarion ms. FBM-003 (fols. 163vc, 164rab, FBM-007, MR-041.

The composer of the Qәne tells that Däbrä Dammo is “crying” (ls 1-4) because it could not find a good “shepherd” who would protects its people (ls 5-9); So that asks St. Michael to appoint one before it is late (ls 10-11).

div.span: ne-poem, of kәbr yәˀәti and ˁǝṭanä mogär type.

item.p: The composer tried to tell in his Qәne, the need for a new abbot (not clear whether a substitute or a replacement) for Däbrä Dammo. In lines 8-10, he said ‘May Abunä ʾArägawi sleep every day with his bride Däbrä Damo until she gives birth to a new shepherd’.

div.span: ne-poem, of kәbr yәˀәti and ˁǝṭanä mogär type.

item.p: The composer of the Qәne pleads God to end the unrest in Däbrä Dammo (ls. 4-5), in which qäysä gäbäz Bәʾәse ʾƎgziʾabḥer (s. the colophon) was very tolerant (ls. 6-7).

list.item: - The title of the book and the internal number of monastic library (326) is written in black paint on fol. 1r. - Pen trial on fol. 2r. - Writing excersises on fols. 2r - A full line is erased on fol 24ra. - Sälam-hymn to St. Mary is written in the upper margin of the Ms. on fol. 30v. - Parchment cuts crudely repaired on fol. 56. - Tämälläs-sign on fol. 62rc indicating the place wherethe omission at the upper margin, belongs. - Five lines are erased on fol. 74a and c. - One line note on St. Lalibäla is written in the upper margin of fol. 86v. - Tämälläs-sign on fol. 87ra indicating the place where the sälam-hymn on St. Lalibäla at the upper margin, belongs. - Names of the scribes, Zä-Krǝstos and Śärḍä Mikaʾel, are written at the bottom of the Ms. on fols 3r, 30r. Other two unidentified names, Yämanä Krǝstos and Ṣägga Krǝstos are also given the same style like the scribes on fols. 50r, 101r. - A correction made interlineally on fol. 143rc. - A note on the inauguration of the church of Däbrä Dammo, annexed at the end of a column on fol. 143vc-144ra. - Sälam-hymn to ʾabba Zӓ-Wäldä Maryam inserted at the tail of column a on fol. 149r. - Pen trial notes, one mentioning Wednesday on fol. 165v. - A note mentioning ʾabba Gäbrä Ṣadәq as the head of store house on fol. 165v.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered with brown tooled leather, textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.
Two rows of endband stitches through the spine cover.

origin.origDate: On the 19th year of reign of King Fasilädäs (r. 1632-67) (s. colophon).

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

person.persName: Three persons are mentioned throughout the Ms. as commissioners, Bәʾәse ʾƎgziʾabǝḥer (e.g., Additio 4; his death is mentioned in Additio 2), his son Gäbrʾel (e.g., Additio 4), and ʾabunä Zä-Śәllase (e.g., Additio 6; his death is mentioned in Additio 10).

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5
